short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows and filters the broadband speed of a property on the RightMove search page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays broadband speeds available in a properties postcode.
Also allows for filtering by a minimum available internet speed.
